primary.description: Default text color throughout the UI.

secondary.description: Example uses include introduction paragraphs, labels, and descriptions paired with form elements.

tertiary.description: Used to imply visual hierarchy relative to primary and secondary text colors, e.g. headlines and labels.

placeholder.description: Text color for placeholder text within form elements.

disabled.description: Used for text paired with disabled content or components, like the form elements.

critical.description: Expresses an error, danger, or otherwise critical state.

critical-strong.description: Expresses an error, danger, or otherwise critical state on surfaces that require a stronger contrast.

success-strong.description: Indicates a strong positive state on surfaces that require a stronger contrast.

warning.description: Indicates information that requires userâ€™s attention and further action may be necessary.

primary-inverted.description: Primary text that sits on high-contrast surfaces or backgrounds.

secondary-inverted.description: Secondary text color that sits on high-contrast surfaces or backgrounds.

tertiary-inverted.description: Tertiary text color that sits on high-contrast surfaces or backgrounds.

muted-inverted.description: Muted text color that sits on high-contrast surfaces or backgrounds.

placeholder-inverted.description: Placeholder text color that sits on high-contrast surfaces or backgrounds.

disabled-inverted.description: Disabled text color that sits on high-contrast surfaces or backgrounds.

critical-inverted.description: Critical text that sits on high-contrast surfaces or backgrounds

critical-strong-inverted.description: Critical strong text that sits on high-contrast surfaces or backgrounds

success-inverted.description: Success text that sits on high-contrast surfaces or backgrounds

success-strong-inverted.description: Success strong text that sits on high-contrast surfaces or backgrounds

warning-inverted.description: Warning text that sits on high-contrast surfaces or backgrounds

secondary-opaque.description: Secondary surface as opaque background color.

moderate-opaque.description: Moderate surface as opaque background color.

bold-opaque.description: Bold surface as opaque background color.

strong-opaque.description: Strong surface as opaque background color.

contrast-opaque.description: Contrast surface as opaque background color.

backdrop.description: Background color for a modal-like backdrop.

critical-opaque.description: Critical surface as opaque background color.

critical-subtle-opaque.description: Critical subtle surface as opaque background color.

warning-opaque.description: Warning surface as opaque background color

warning-subtle-opaque.description: Warning subtle surface as opaque background color

success-opaque.description: Success surface as opaque background color.

success-subtle-opaque.description: Success subtle surface as opaque background color.

info-opaque.description: Info surface as opaque background color.

info-subtle-opaque.description: Info surface as opaque background color.

primary.description: Default surface color for the majority of surfaces.

moderate.description: A tertiary surface level, prominent without being too overpowering.

bold.description: Highlight or call attention to specific areas of the interface.

strong.description: Use sparingly to draw the eye to a relatively important region.

contrast.description: An inverted surface for lightened content and elements, most likely paired with inverted foreground colors.

critical.description: Background surface color containing error, danger, or otherwise critical messaging or elements.

critical-subtle.description: A softer version of the Critical surface.

critical-strong.description: A contrasting critical surface, most likely paired with inverted foreground colors.

warning.description: Background surface color highlighting messaging or elements that may require user's attention.

warning-subtle.description: A softer version of the default warning surface.

warning-strong.description: A contrasting warning surface, most likely paired with inverted foreground colors.

success.description: Background surface color containing messaging or elements expressing a positive or successful state.

success-subtle.description: A softer version of the default success surface.

success-strong.description: A contrasting positive state surface, most likely paired with inverted foreground colors.

info.description: Background surface color containing messaging or elements communicated as generally informational.

info-subtle.description: A softer version of the default informational surface.

info-strong.description: A contrasting informational surface, most likely paired with inverted foreground colors.

md.description: Base default medium text style for main content.

md-compact.description: A tighter-spaced version of medium body style.

sm.description: Reduced small text style for less prominent or adjacent content.

sm-compact.description: A tighter-spaced version of small body style.

eyebrow.description: Visually concise and uppercase title text used above a paired headline. Also known as a kicker or overline.

sm.description: Smaller text size for secondary information or subheadings.

sm-compact.description: A tighter-spaced version of small headline style.

sm-soft.description: A softer font weight version of small headline style.

sm-soft-compact.description: A softer font weight, tighter-spaced version of small headline style.

md.description: Medium-sized base text style for headlines.

md-compact.description: A tighter-spaced version of medium headline style.

lg.description: Large text style for headlines to attract attention.

lg-soft.description: A softer font weight version of large headline style.

lg-compact.description: A tighter-spaced version of large body style.

lg-soft-compact.description: A softer font weight, tighter spaced version of large headline style.

xl.description: Extra large text style for high importance headlines.

xl-compact.description: A tighter-spaced version of extra large headline style.

xxl.description: Largest text style for extra extra large content.

xxl-compact.description: A tighter-spaced version of extra extra large headline style.

md.description: Base default medium-sized text style for labels, providing clear identification and categorization.

md-compact.description: A tighter-spaced version of medium label style.

md-plain.description: A non-bold version of medium label style.

md-plain-compact.description: A non-bolded, tighter-spaced version of medium label style.

sm.description: Smaller text style for labels when space is limited or for secondary information or to convey a slightly lower hierachy.

sm-compact.description: A tighter-spaced version of small label style.

sm-plain.description: A non-bold version of small label style.

sm-plain-compact.description: A non-bolded, tighter-spaced version of small label style.

md.description: Base default medium-sized text style for supplementary contextual information.

sm.description: Smaller text size for subtle guidance or additional context, minimizing visual disruption.

md.description: Base default medium-sized text style for monospace code snippets of technical content.

sm.description: Smaller text size for monospace code, suitable for inline references or less prominent code examples.

xs.description: Text style for extra small inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

sm.description: Text style for small inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

md.description: Text style for medium inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

lg.description: Text style for large inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

xl.description: Text style for extra large inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

xs.description: Line height for extra small inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

sm.description: Line height for small inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

md.description: Line height for medium inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

lg.description: Line height for large inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

xl.description: Line height for extra large inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

xs.description: Font size for extra small inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

sm.description: Font size for small inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

md.description: Font size for medium inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

lg.description: Font size for large inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

xl.description: Font size for extra large inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

xs.description: Font weight for extra small inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

sm.description: Font weight for small inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

md.description: Font weight for medium inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

lg.description: Font weight for large inputs (e.g. input and textarea)

xl.description: Font weight for extra large inputs (e.g. input and textarea)
